```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
df <- read.csv('amazon.csv')
df
```
```{r}
df <- filter(df, number > 0)
df
```

```{r}
q <- ggplot(df, aes(year, number))
```

```{r}
q + geom_bar(stat = "identity", color='red') +
  xlab("Ano") + ylab("Quantidade de queimadas")

```


```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(year)) + geom_density(kernel="gaussian")
```


```{r}
q + geom_line()
```

```{r}
q + geom_jitter()
```
